changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout installation proposé des plugins s: Addition proposed installation of plugins on service pack
changelog.md.Ajout du Discover qui permet de trouver: Addition of Discover which allows you to find compatible equipment on the local network (LAN
changelog.md.Integration de l'installation automatiqu: Integration of the automatic installation of the Atlas plugin

index.md.Jeeasy se lance AUTOMATIQUEMENT au démar: Jeeasy launches AUTOMATICALLY when your box starts IF you have an official Jeedom box (Smart, Atlas, Luna, Boxs Pros
index.md.Il est important de renseigner son compt: It is important to fill in your Market account and follow the progress of Jeeasy because it is he who will proceed with the installation of the necessary plugins as well as the update of your box
index.md.A son premier lancement, il est importan: At its first launch, it is important to complete the Jeeasy process, which is done in 2 phases
index.md.Il vous demande de renseigner votre comp: It asks you to fill in your market account
index.md.Cela permettra de mettre à jour la box a: This will update the box as well as the Jeeasy plugin, to launch its second phase
index.md.La personnalisation et le paramètrage de: Customization and configuration of your box
index.md.Jeeasy vous permet de pre-installer des: Jeeasy allows you to pre-install plugins, rename your box, change language... It will also install the Atlas or Luna plugin depending on your hardware
index.md.Vous pourrez ensuite vous rendre dans le: You can then go to the plugin, via Plugins/Programming/Jeeasy, and click on Detect my Equipment
index.md.Cette fonctionnalité permettra de scanne: This feature will scan your network in search of your equipment, and thus offer you compatible plugins, which will allow you to control and manage your equipment
